title: Bryan Garris from Knocked Loose
itunes:title: Bryan Garris from Knocked Loose
description:
Episode 258 - Oh boy, this episode is a doozy! We have Bryan Garris from Knocked Loose on the show, who is the vocalist of the much discussed hardcore band. It’s a deep conversation about Louisville music, popularity and education and the importance of it. Many people have an opinion on this band, let this conversation guide you and give more context for where these young upstarts are coming from! Pre-Order the new Conveyer entitled NO FUTURE today!Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
